info.name: Diffusion Growth
info.description: Some value can be a positive number from 0-1 anywhere on the screen. Gaussian blur using multiple radii. The value increases or decreases based on the blur field. Parameters in Common

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define R iResolution.xy
#define A(U) texture(iChannel0,(U)/R)
#define B(U) texture(iChannel1,(U)/R)
#define C(U) texture(iChannel2,(U)/R)
#define D(U) texture(iChannel3,(U)/R)

// Coefficient of each blur
#define K 2.*vec4(1,-1,1,-1)

// Standard Deviation of each blur radius
#define std vec4(1.5,5.1,1.2,4)

// Gaussian Blur Sampling Radius
#define I 15.
renderpass.name: Common
Buffer A
Buffer B
Buffer C
